SEARCH
Package server.dataAccess

Interface DataAccessInterface

public interface DataAccessInterface
DataAccessInterface allows for data to be inserted and returned from the database Implementations for games, users, and authorization tokens

  • Method Details

    • insert

      int insert()
      Allows Data to be inserted to the database
      Returns:
      ID number of the data inserted

    • find

      Game find(int gameID) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Parameters:
      gameID - of game to find
      Returns:
      Game if found
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if GameId is invalid/ game not found

    • findAll

      String findAll()
      Returns:
      String representation of data type being accessed

    • claimSpot

      void claimSpot(int gameID, String username) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      claims a spot in the game for the user provided
      Parameters:
      gameID - of game to join
      username - of user looking to join the game
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if user or game not able to be found

    • updateGame

      void updateGame(int gameID, String newName) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      renames a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - to be renamed
      newName - of game
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if game cannot be found

    • remove

      void remove(int gameID) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      removes a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - of game to remove
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if game cannot be found

    • clear

      void clear()
      clears all data in implementation
